Articles.Content:
Can anybody please tell me how to make mods?

Thanks before hand.

There is no single way to 'make mods'. How you make one depends on what that mod does, there's no point downloading a modelling program if you want to make a mission pack for example.

Be more specific about what you're trying to achieve and how far you've got on your own.
I don't have idea, i'm a 3d modeler and I would like to make some interesting ship design for this game, but I don't know where to start and how to put 3d models in the game

I don't have idea, i'm a 3d modeler and I would like to make some interesting ship design for this game, but I don't know where to start and how to put 3d models in the game

There are two tutorials on the first page of the modelling forum about than a month old, they'd be a good place to start.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25040-Unity-to-KSP-A-Detailed-Tutorial

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25040-Unity-to-KSP-A-Detailed-Tutorial

Thanks for the answers. I some how thought about making new parts so I'm going to check these sites out.

Thanks a lot.

there is no single way to 'make mods'. How you make one depends on what that mod does, there's no point downloading a modelling program if you want to make a mission pack for example.

i somehow thought about mkeing parts. How can i do that?

There are tutorials to make mods with new parts.

 

But i want to make a mod that adds a ''ocean'' to Jool, which you can land on.
